safety_flags.evidence: The text uses suggestive and potentially shaming language ('wouldn't you be stepping out of the water & spreading your legs? what does your butt look like ;3') which could pressure someone to conform to certain expectations or feel uncomfortable expressing themselves differently.
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user could be engaging in playful banter or attempting to flirt in a provocative manner, without intending to enforce a specific narrative or cause harm.
